Articles.Content:
So all of a sudden every ship I send to orbit just vanishes.. had one disappear in mid-launch just now...

[LOG 00:42:08.071] [AutoSave]: Game Saved

[LOG 00:47:11.373] Flight State Captured

[LOG 00:47:11.374] Saving Achievements Tree...

[LOG 00:47:11.375] [TCA] TCAConfiguration.SaveConfigs: vessel d5182d92-957e-4830-ac36-1cba60ce63f8 is not present in the game. Removing orphan configuration.

[LOG 00:47:11.379] [KSP Interstellar] GameEventSubscriber - detected onGameStateSaved

[LOG 00:47:11.379] [KSPI] - Loading ConfigNode C:/Games/Steam/steamapps/common/Kerbal Space Program/KSP_Data/../saves/Jimbo II/persistent.sfs

[LOG 00:47:11.572] Game State Saved to saves/Jimbo II/persistent

[LOG 00:47:11.572] [AutoSave]: Game Saved

[LOG 00:52:13.733] Flight State Captured

[LOG 00:52:13.734] Saving Achievements Tree...

It says the ship does not exist in the log file... what is happening?
Savegames are freaking FUBAR... I quicksave several times along a mission to land on the mun... then revert using F9 and get something that was like 3-4 hours back with a completely different ship.
Well I can tell you that Throttle Control Avionics seems to be the mod that is deleting the ships. You might want to post this as a bug to the developers of the mod.
